titles.title: I Love Thy Kingdom Lord (hymn of the Church)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love Thy kingdom Lord The house of Thine abode The church our blest Redeemer saved With His own precious blood{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love Thy church O God Her walls before Thee stand Dear as the apple of Thine eye And graven on Thy hand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For her my tears shall fall For her my prayers ascend To her my cares and toils be giv'n Till toils and cares shall end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Beyond my highest joy I prize her heavenly ways Her sweet communion solemn vows Her hymns of love and praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sure as Thy truth shall last To Zion shall be given The brightest glories earth can yield And brighter bliss of heaven{/lang-eng}
